featured.text: In 2016, the city council decided to put its 85,000 pigeon population on a birth control pill to block the formation of eggs in birds.
Starting from April 2017, the pills were placed in 40 bird feeders 20 throughout the city.

definition.zh_def: 藥丸；藥片，通常用於治療或預防疾病。
definition.en_def: A small round mass of solid medicine to be swallowed.
definition.example: She took a pill to relieve her headache.
